T

ThreadHost - Class in tp.checkers.server
ThreadHost is an variant of ThreadPlayer with implemented communication necessary for initialising the game.
ThreadHost(Socket) - Constructor for class tp.checkers.server.ThreadHost
Constructor; sets the socket in extending class.
ThreadPlayer - Class in tp.checkers.server
Thread class; each tread is assigned to one player and one client; Responsible for handling the communication, receiving and sending messages to and from a client.
ThreadPlayer(Socket) - Constructor for class tp.checkers.server.ThreadPlayer
Constructor; assigns socket and object streams.
